mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_NO ,A.ORDER_DATE ,B.NAME ,B.ID ,B.PHONE_NUMBER ,B.ADDRESS1 FROM TBL_ORDER A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.ORDER_CODE = '${clickedOrderCode}'

SELECT A.PRODUCT_PHOTO ,A.PRODUCT_NAME ,A.PRODUCT_CODE ,A.PRODUCT_PRICE ,B.ORDER_AMOUNT ,A.PRODUCT_PREMIUM_PRICE FROM TBL_PRODUCT A JOIN TBL_ORDER_PRODUCT B ON (A.PRODUCT_CODE = B.PRODUCT_CODE) JOIN TBL_ORDER C ON (B.ORDER_CODE = C.ORDER_CODE) WHERE C.ORDER_CODE = '${clickedOrderCode}'
SELECT ORDER_PRICE , ORDER_DISCOUNT , ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE FROM TBL_ORDER WHERE ORDER_CODE = '${clickedOrderCode}'
